attributes.action: Close all schools and colleges in the uk till the virus ends
attributes.additional_details: We need action now to prevent spread and deaths. We need to act now and fast before it’s too late. There is evidence all over the uk and the world about the virus killing people. Children and parents are scared and some children are refusing to go to school afraid they will get ill.
attributes.background: We want all schools in uk to close until the Coronavirus ends to stop anymore spreading and prevent deaths.
